NEON Nitrate Survey Data

Source: R/data.R
neon_nitrate.Rd

Surface water nitrate data collected by NEON at COM sites.

Usage

neon_nitrate

Format

A data frame with one row per 15-minute sample:

start_date_time

Start time of sample (POSIXct)

end_date_time

End time of sample (POSIXct)

surf_water_nitrate_mean

Mean water nitrate concentration (mg/L)

surf_water_nitrate_minimum

Minimum nitrate concentration (mg/L)

surf_water_nitrate_maximum

Maximum nitrate concentration (mg/L)

surf_water_nitrate_variance

Variance of nitrate values

surf_water_nitrate_num_pts

Number of measurements in interval

surf_water_nitrate_exp_uncert

Experimental uncertainty

surf_water_nitrate_std_er_mean

Standard error of mean

final_qf

Quality flag

Source

NEON project: COMO site nitrate data, https://data.neonscience.org/

Details

Data are derived from high-frequency COM site sensors, cleaned to remove missing values in mean nitrate and timestamps.

See also

nitrate_sample_distribution, strata_summary, pop_est

Examples

data(neon_nitrate)
summary(neon_nitrate$surf_water_nitrate_mean)
#>    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
#>    3.20    7.20   10.10   10.24   12.50   24.00 
head(neon_nitrate)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 10
#>   start_date_time     end_date_time       surf_water_nitrate_mean
#>   <dttm>              <dttm>                                <dbl>
#> 1 2020-03-01 00:00:00 2020-03-01 00:15:00                     9.6
#> 2 2020-03-01 00:15:00 2020-03-01 00:30:00                     9.6
#> 3 2020-03-01 00:30:00 2020-03-01 00:45:00                     9.6
#> 4 2020-03-01 00:45:00 2020-03-01 01:00:00                     9.6
#> 5 2020-03-01 01:00:00 2020-03-01 01:15:00                     9.6
#> 6 2020-03-01 01:15:00 2020-03-01 01:30:00                     9.6
#> # ℹ 7 more variables: surf_water_nitrate_minimum <dbl>,
#> #   surf_water_nitrate_maximum <dbl>, surf_water_nitrate_variance <dbl>,
#> #   surf_water_nitrate_num_pts <dbl>, surf_water_nitrate_exp_uncert <dbl>,
#> #   surf_water_nitrate_std_er_mean <dbl>, final_qf <dbl>
